analysis: The project is a static website with a black hole theme. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website. The theme should focus on black holes, with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The website should be mobile-friendly and include interactive elements.

improvements.description: Add CSS animations for black hole visuals, including swirling effects and glowing elements to enhance the cosmic theme.
Implement a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon to improve usability on mobile devices.
Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
